main event: An unidentified flying object was observed at Malmstrom AFB, Montana, in August 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a volleyball and bright silver in color., The object made a whistling sound that faded and rose in pitch., The object's movements included making sharp turns that could not be attributed to known aircraft., A radar operator observed the target for about 10 to 15 minutes, noting unusual acceleration and maneuvers., The incident involved coordination with NORAD and resulted in radar tracking of an unidentified target without visual confirmation.
sighted object: bright silver shaped object resembling a volleyball
